name: Ragnarok (smOw)
description:
Ragnarok is a real-time management game. Your main objective is to conquer whole of the map !

Good management of your clan will be required to anihilate your enemies and achieve your goals.

Graphistes

  • Alexandre LAGUIGNIER.
  • Antoine   BERNOUD.
  • Romain    ESPINOSA.

Programmeurs

  • Andgel    VANBESIEN.
  • Basile    MILLEREUX.
  • Jeremie   DURAND.
  • Youssef    OUCHICHAOU.

Compositor

  • Paddy Smith.

Engine : Love2D in LUA

Art asset : Photoshop

Pixel art direction !

Ragnarok was made during a student project from school Creajeux. (2020)
